dmca.title: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 28, 2005 12:29 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC

July 28, 2005

BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com; <mailto:copyright@theplanet.com;>
abuse@theplanet.com

AND FIRST CLASS MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

Attention: George Poletes

RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC 

.Dear Mr. Poletes:

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

It has come to Rolex's attention that your company is the Internet Service
Provider for www.1stworldtradeportal.com. This website is designed to aid,
abet and assist others on how to obtain replica Rolex watches by providing
information and linking to several websites that offer counterfeit Rolex
watches for sale. Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is likely to
cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark infringement and
dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in violation of both
federal and state laws. We are writing to inform you that as the Internet
Service Provider for www.1stworldtradeportal.com, ThePlanet.com Internet
Services, Inc. may be held liable for trademark counterfeiting and
infringement.

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note
the following: 

        
1.        Signature of the undersigned set forth below.

        

        

        
2.        www.1stworldtradeportal.com is designed to aid, abet and assist
others on how to obtain replica Rolex watches by providing information and
linking to several websites that offer counterfeit Rolex watches for sale
and the sale of counterfeit merchandise is prohibited by federal law (15
U.S.C.
